articles.title: U.S. officials concerned about new COVID variants - FOX 5 New York
articles.description: COVID-19 infections from the omicron subvariants designated BQ.1 and BQ.1.1 are growing fast in Europe and appear to be rising in the U.S., too.
articles.content:
NEW YORK - COVID-19 infections from the omicron subvariants designated BQ.1 and BQ.1.1 are growing fast in Europe.
So far, these subvariants account for more than 10% of new COVID infections in the … [+1764 chars]
